name: iPhone sizes (incl. iPhone 13)
description:
Frames for all 26 iPhones that are supported by iOS 12 and up. If your app is targeting iOS 12 and newer, you need to be designing for these 7 frame sizes.


Includes all iPhone devices from the iPhone 5S to the iPhone 13 Pro Max.


Updates

  • 20 Jan 2021: added safe areas for status bars and home indicator
  • 15 Sept 2021: added four devices: 13 Mini, 13, 13 Pro and 13 Pro Max
